messages.subject: new here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all this is my first posting to this group, but I have been lurking on the nihonto list for some time and I have noticed a few familiar names from that
messages.messageBody:
Hi all this is my first posting to this group, but I have been lurking on the nihonto list for some time and I have noticed
a few familiar names from that group are here as well. I am very much interested in Japanese history and I look forward to
learning all I can on the subject. To keep this on topic, who do you think was the most tallented general in the Korean
invasions.........my vote is for Kato Kiyomasa. I would be interested to here your views on the subject.

Best Regards Dave




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
